questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against a Warlord of the Sea who rules over a kingdom in the sky. What is...?
This arc takes place on an island inhabited by giants and involves a struggle against a corrupt government official. What is...?
Set on a frozen island, this arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates and the G-5 marines against a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This power, used by a high-ranking member of the Revolutionary Army, allows control over the properties of gravity. What is...?
This devil fruit allows its user to create tremors capable of causing massive destruction, and was notably used by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to control, produce, and become mochi. What is...?
This character, a former member of the Roger Pirates and known for his light-light fruit powers, played a significant role in the Void Century. Who is...?
This revolutionary is known for his crow zone ability and efforts to overthrow the World Government. Who is...?
This former member of the Royal Shichibukai is known for their Snake-Snake Fruit powers and role as the queen of Amazon Lily. Who is...?
